CmdLine: apt-get update --fix-missing     && apt-get install -y wget git make     && cd /usr/local     && wget --no-check-certificate https://storage.googleapis.com/golang/go1.10.3.linux-amd64.tar.gz     && tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.10.3.linux-amd64.tar.gz     && rm -f go1.10.3.linux-amd64.tar.gz     && mkdir -p /gopath/     && go get -u github.com/golang/dep/cmd/dep     && mkdir -p /gopath/src/github.com/evolbioinfo/     && cd /gopath/src/github.com/evolbioinfo/     && git clone https://github.com/evolbioinfo/gotree.git     && cd /gopath/src/github.com/evolbioinfo/gotree     && make dep && make build     && mv gotree /usr/local/bin/     && make test     && cd /usr/local     && rm -rf /gopath /usr/local/go     && apt-get remove -y wget git make     && apt-get autoremove -y     && apt-get clean     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*     && mkdir /pasteur
Commands.Name: run
